name: Hammer Time (Pioure)
description:
Hammer Time is a solo player based game in which you incarnate an engineer who crafts alien weapons in your garage. Your goal is to craft weapons for your alien customers and improve your hammer in order to work faster before the time limit. 

GAMEPLAY

On each level, you will have a certain number of orders that will have to craft and send through the postal portal near to your workstation following a blueprint recipe and using components available on your shelves. Certain weapons will need to be treated carefully (light hits) and others will require more strength (heavy hits) otherwise you might break your weapon and start again with new components.

CONTROL

Pick up a component with your mouse to generate one unit
Soft hit : E 
Heavy hit : Q

TEAM

Producer : Ahmed Ben Amor
Game Designer: Gonzalo Ezequiel Bordón
Programmers : Diego Mortenssen - Bilal Zemali -  Francisco Sabbatella
Artists: Francisco Sabbatella - Matías De la Cruz
Sound Designer : Cactiisemia

CONTEXT

This game was developped in 5 days by a a randomly composed team by French and Argentinian participants during the "FRAxARG Game Jam", organized by l'Institut Français d'Argentine and the FundAV (Fundación Argentina de Videojuegos). Our goal was to release a short fun game to enjoy.

Have fun, and don't hesitate to provide us with your feedback. :)
